sentences.en: Clothes are the best bargain, with many items marked down.
sentences.cn: 买衣服是最划算的，许多衣服都降价了。

sentences.en: For more details about these products, send a postcard marked HB/FF.
sentences.cn: 要了解这些产品的详细信息，请寄来标明HB/FF字样的明信片。

sentences.en: He frugally saved various bits of the machine in carefully marked boxes.
sentences.cn: 他厉行节约地把这台机器的各种零件放进仔细标记的盒子里收好。

sentences.en: Her independence of spirit marked her out from her male fellow officers.
sentences.cn: 她的独立精神使她有别于共事的男性军官。

sentences.en: His writings were marked by an extraordinary lucidity and elegance of style.
sentences.cn: 他的作品简洁明晰，文风典雅。

sentences.en: I marked the ground and then paced it out to be sure.
sentences.cn: 我在地面上作了标记，然后为了确保起见步测了一下。

sentences.en: Miller’s organized desk stood in marked contrast to the rest of the office.
sentences.cn: 米勒的桌子上整理得井井有条，和办公室里的其他桌子形成明显的对比。

sentences.en: Miss Hoare called out names and marked them off.
sentences.cn: 霍尔小姐点名后把它们一一划掉。

sentences.en: That day marked the beginning of a 20-year estrangement.
sentences.cn: 从那一天开始了长达20年的互不往来。
这扇门上标着“私人房间”。

sentences.en: The figures marked the final low point of the present economic cycle.
sentences.cn: 这些数据显示了目前经济周期的最低点。

sentences.en: The patient showed a marked improvement in her condition after changing medication.
sentences.cn: 换药治疗后病人的病情明显好转。

sentences.en: The style is marked by simplicity, clarity, and candor.
sentences.cn: 这种风格的特点是简洁、清楚、直截了当。

sentences.en: The trends since the 1950s have become even more marked.
sentences.cn: 20世纪50年代以来，这些趋势更加显而易见。

sentences.en: Theoretically, the price is supposed to be marked on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 照理说，价格应该标在货架上。

sentences.en: They are showing a marked disinclination to pursue these opportunities.
sentences.cn: 他们对争取这些机会明显表现出不乐意。

sentences.en: They marked out the boundaries of our visual universe.
sentences.cn: 他们标出了我们视觉经验领域的界限。

words.tran_cn: 明显地；显著地；引人注目地
记分员；书签；标识物；作记号的人
注意；作记号于；给…打分数（mark的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 显著的，著名的，有记号的，加印记的，受监视的
表示(mark的过去分词)，作记号，给…打分，在…留下痕迹
